mapper.select: SELECT e.`id`, e.`exam_id`, e.`staff_id`, `section_id`, e.`exam_count`, e.`exam_time`, e.`exam_result`, e.`exam_timeC` FROM `smart_site`.`exam_record` e INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`exam` r ON e.`exam_id`=r.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`staff` s ON e.`staff_id`=s.`id` WHERE e.`section_id`=#{section_id} and e.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} ORDER BY e.`exam_time` DESC
